attributes.action: Block The extradition of Julian Assange to the USA
attributes.background: Julian Assange had revealed evidence of atrocities in Iraq and Afghanistan Committed by the us government and his extradition should be opposed by the British government.

rejection.details:
This is a decision for the courts, which are independent of the UK Government and Parliament.

You can read more about the case here:
https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/world-affairs/europe/extradition-from-the-uk-what-next-for-julian-assange/
